query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rightsAttestations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  releaseId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  rightsType ENUM('independent','label_authorized','split_rights') NOT NULL,
  territoriesCovered TEXT NOT NULL,
  attestationText TEXT NOT NULL,
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  userAgent VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  attestationVersion VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.0',
  attestedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX rights_att_release_idx (releaseId),
  INDEX rights_att_user_idx (userId),
  INDEX rights_att_time_idx (attestedAt),
  FOREIGN KEY (releaseId) REFERENCES releases(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id)
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  releaseId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  rightsType ENUM('independent','label_authorized','split_rights') NOT NULL,
  territoriesCovered TEXT NOT NULL,
  attestationText TEXT NOT NULL,
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  userAgent VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  attestationVersion VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.0',
  attestedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX rights_att_release_idx (releaseId),
  INDEX rights_att_user_idx (userId),
  INDEX rights_att_time_idx (attestedAt),
  FOREIGN KEY (releaseId) REFERENCES releases(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id)
);
